languages.text: {n}Сверкнув окулярами, префект оскорбленно отвечает:{/n} "Я, презренная слуга Его, не имею права перевирать факты. Мне должно оценивать последствия и делать все возможное, чтобы Империум получал причитающееся — такова цель моего существования". {n}Вдруг голос старухи смягчается и становится почти назидательным.{/n} "С высоты своего опыта позвольте сказать: забота о благе Империума — это тяжелая, хоть и почетная ноша. То, что даже Вольный Торговец испытывает с этим трудности, лишь подтверждает мои многолетние наблюдения".

traits.locale_text: "Не имею подобной привычки, Ваша Светлость. Ввиду краткости ваших формулировок вынуждена дополнять протокол недостающими сведениями. К тому же, видя лишь сияющий реверс монеты, невозможно составить мнение о ее номинале. Однако все имеет обратную сторону, и в данном случае это негативные последствия. А они неизбежны..." {n}Сверкнув окулярами, Префект поднимает на вас глаза.{/n} "...независимо от результата. Верная оценка рисков позволяет нейтрализовать их с минимальными потерями".

languages.text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

languages.text: {n}Die Okularlinsen der Präfektin blitzen auf, als sie in beleidigtem Ton antwortet:{/n} "Ich, Seine niedere und unwürdige Dienerin, habe kein Recht, Fakten zu verdrehen. Meine Pflicht lautet, Konsequenzen einzuschätzen und alles Mögliche zu tun, damit das Imperium erhält, was ihm zusteht. Das ist der Zweck meiner Existenz." {n}Plötzlich wird die Stimme der alten Frau weniger streng und beinahe belehrend.{/n} "Aus meinem reichen Erfahrungsschatz würde ich sagen, wenn ich darf, dass es eine schwere, wenn auch ehrenhafte Bürde ist, sich um den Wohlstand des Imperiums zu kümmern. Der Umstand, dass selbst {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} dabei Schwierigkeiten haben kann, bestätigt meine jahrelangen Beobachtungen."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

Der Umstand, dass selbst {mf|ein Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} dabei Schwierigkeiten haben kann, bestätigt meine jahrelangen Beobachtungen."

languages.text: {n}Les lorgnons mécaniques de la préfète s'illuminent tandis qu'elle répond d'un ton offensé :{/n} « En ma qualité d'humble servante de l'Empereur, rien ne m'autorise à déformer les faits. Mon devoir consiste à évaluer les conséquences de vos actes et à tout mettre en œuvre pour que l'Imperium reçoive son dû. Telle est ma seule et unique raison d'être. » {n}Soudain, la voix de la vieille femme devient moins sévère et prend un ton quasi didactique.{/n} « Si je puis me permettre, et c'est l'expérience qui parle, veiller à la prospérité de l'Imperium est une lourde tâche, si honorable soit-elle. Que même {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} puisse rencontrer des difficultés dans l'exercice de ces fonctions ne fait que confirmer ce que j'ai pu observer au cours de mes longues années de pratique. »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

Que même {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} puisse rencontrer des difficultés dans l'exercice de ces fonctions ne fait que confirmer ce que j'ai pu observer au cours de mes longues années de pratique. »

languages.text: {n}行政官视线穿过了镜片，以受到冒犯的语气开了口。{/n}“我不过是帝皇卑微的奴仆，我无权扭曲任何事实。我的职责仅仅是评估后果，尽我所能地确保帝国的一切利益，这就是我存在本身的意义。”{n}突然间，老妇人的声音不再那么严厉，听起来几乎是在谆谆教诲。{/n}“虽然这么说有自夸的嫌疑，不过，以我在内政部的丰富经验来看，保障帝国的繁荣尽管是项光荣的职责，但也同样是个沉重的负担。根据我多年来的观察经验，即便是像行商浪人这样的大人物，履行职责的过程中也难免会遇到困难。”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官视线穿过了镜片，以受到冒犯的语气开了口。{/n}“我不过是帝皇卑微的奴仆，我无权扭曲任何事实。我的职责仅仅是评估后果，尽我所能地确保帝国的一切利益，这就是我存在本身的意义。”{n}突然间，老妇人的声音不再那么严厉，听起来几乎是在谆谆教诲。{/n}“虽然这么说有自夸的嫌疑，不过，以我在内政部的丰富经验来看，保障帝国的繁荣尽管是项光荣的职责，但也同样是个沉重的负担。根据我多年来的观察经验，即便是像行商浪人这样的大人物，履行职责的过程中也难免会遇到困难。”

languages.text: {n}Las lentes oculares de la prefecta destellan mientras responde con tono ofendido:{/n} «Yo, como mera sirvienta indigna Suya, no tengo derecho a tergiversar ningún acto. Mi deber es valorar consecuencias y hago todo lo que puedo para asegurarme de que el Imperium reciba lo que se le debe. Ese es el propósito de mi existencia». {n}De repente, la voz de la anciana pasa de severo a casi instructivo.{/n} «Según mi amplia experiencia, aunque no esté bien decirlo, encargarse de la prosperidad del Imperium es una carga pesada, aunque honrada. El hecho de que incluso un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente pueda tener dificultades para hacerlo no hace más que confirmar las observaciones que he hecho durante años».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

Mi deber es valorar consecuencias y hago todo lo que puedo para asegurarme de que el Imperium reciba lo que se le debe. Ese es el propósito de mi existencia». {n}De repente, la voz de la anciana pasa de severo a casi instructivo.{/n} «Según mi amplia experiencia, aunque no esté bien decirlo, encargarse de la prosperidad del Imperium es una carga pesada, aunque honrada. El hecho de que incluso un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente pueda tener dificultades para hacerlo no hace más que confirmar las observaciones que he hecho durante años».

languages.text: {n}総監の眼鏡が光り、彼女は気分を害した口調で答えた。{/n}「私は卑しい身でありながらも、事実を歪める権利などありません。私の務めは結果を評価し、帝国が正当に受け取るべきものを確実に得られるよう全力を尽くすことです。それが私の存在意義なのです」{n}突然、老女の声は厳しさを和らげ、ほとんど教訓めいた調子になった。{/n}「長年の経験から申し上げれば、帝国の繁栄を支えることは重い責任ではありますが、同時に光栄なことでもあります。ローグトレーダーでさえ困難に直面することがあるという事実は、私の長年の観察をさらに裏付けるものです」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

languages.text: {n}Oküler mercekleri parıldayan prefekt, kırgın bir ses tonuyla yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Değersiz bir hizmetkâr olarak benim gerçekleri çarpıtmak gibi bir hakkım yoktur. Benim vazifem, sonuçları değerlendirmek ve bunlar neticesinde İmparatorluk'un hak ettiğini almasını sağlamak için elimden geleni yapmaktır. Benim varlığımın tek amacı budur." {n}Yaşlı kadının sesi birden yumuşuyor ve neredeyse didaktik bir hâl alıyor.{/n} "Deneyimlerime dayanarak söylüyorum ki İmparatorluk'un refahını sağlamak, onurlu bir görev olmakla birlikte bir o kadar da ağır bir yüktür. Bir Hür Tacir'in bile bu görevi yerine getirirken zorlanıyor olması da benim uzun yıllar boyu yapmış olduğum gözlemleri doğrulamaktadır."
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect's ocular lenses flash as she replies in an offended tone,{/n} "I, His lowly and unworthy servant, have no right to twist any facts. My duty is to assess consequences and do everything I can to make sure the Imperium receives what it is owed. That is the purpose of my existence." {n}Suddenly the old woman's voice becomes less stern and almost didactic.{/n} "Speaking from my wealth of experience, if I do say so myself, taking care of the Imperium's prosperity is a heavy burden, albeit an honourable one. The fact that even a Rogue Trader can run into difficulties while doing it only further confirms my many years of observations."

Bir Hür Tacir'in bile bu görevi yerine getirirken zorlanıyor olması da benim uzun yıllar boyu yapmış olduğum gözlemleri doğrulamaktadır."
